title: Cancel transaction
name: cancelRequest
description: This method attempts to cancel the current operation on device. Note that operations cannot be cancelled at certain points in the transaction process

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device

title: Cancel transaction
name: cancelRequest
description: This method attempts to cancel the current operation on device. Note that operations cannot be cancelled at certain points in the transaction process

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This is used if you want to send the operation to a specific device. Recommended if you are using multiple devices

elements.name: currentTransactionStatus
elements.description: Invoked while during transaction with different statuses from card reader

elements.name: endOfTransaction
elements.description: Invoked when the card reader finishes processing the transaction

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
